hp.special: equals your gourmet level + 5 or more hit points allocated from your pool

trait.name: Amorphous Swarm
entries: The batch can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and it can't gain hit points or temporary hit points. The batch can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The batch can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: (Sour Only)
entries: The batch adds your proficiency bonus to the damage it deals, and hit points it loses, when it uses its Slather action to successfully slather a creature.

trait.name: (Sticky Sweet Only)
entries: Every foot of movement while in the batch's space costs 1 extra foot.

action.name: Slather
entries: The batch moves up to its speed. Whenever the batch enters a creature's space, the trifles attempt to cover the creature in the slime that makes up their own bodies. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier). On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 1d4} + your Wisdom modifier acid damage, and is slathered. The slathered creature has its speed reduced by 10 feet and gains disadvantage on ability checks until someone takes an action to wipe off the offending slime.
The batch loses hit points equal to the number rolled on the {@dice d4} whenever it successfully slathers a creature.

action.name: Congeal (Rubbery Only)
entries: The batch moves up to its speed. If the batch ends its movement in an unoccupied space, the trifles gather into a wobbling mass and lose their Amorphous Swarm property. Before the end of your next turn, a creature can bounce off the congealed trifles to double its jump distance. The impact returns the batch to its usual form.

hp.special: 2 + your Wisdom modifier + five times your gourmet level (the golem has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your gourmet level)

trait.name: Aura of Pleasant Warmth
entries: While the golem is not inert, it constantly radiates the earthy heat of the hearth. It and creatures within 15 feet of it suffer no ill effects from cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

trait.name: Limited Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it can choose to expend one of its stored ingredient dice to take no damage and instead regain a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

action.name: Charred Shot (expend 1-3 stored ingredient dice)
entries: {@atk rw} your Wisdom modifier + PB to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target you can see. {@h}number rolled on expended ingredient dice + PB fire damage.

action.name: Eezee Bake
entries: The golem cooks any number of stored ingredient dice of the same size to transform them into golem-fired goodies, which can be retrieved by any friendly creature within 5 feet of it as an action. A golem-fired goodie is an edible object roughly the size of a bun. It lasts for 24 hours before becoming inedible. When consumed by a creature as an action, a goodie restores a number of hit points equal to your PB + a number rolled on the ingredient die used to create it.

reaction.name: Smokescreen
entries: When the golem takes damage as the result of an attack, it can expend one of its stored ingredient dice to create a 20-foot radius sphere of dark smoke centered on itself. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. If the golem would be reduced to 0 hit points by the damage it takes, it can still choose to use this reaction before falling to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Protective Shade (tree only)
entries: Whenever a ranged attack that deals fire, lightning, or radiant damage is made against a target within 10 feet of the plant, the plant becomes the target of the attack instead.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The plant has advantage on saving throws and contested ability checks against any effects that would move it involuntarily.

trait.name: Trailing Tangle (Vine only)
entries: When a creature moves within 15 feet of the plant, the plant can use its reaction to make a Lashing Whip attack against it.

action.name: Highfever Pollen (Flower only)
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 20/30 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 + PB}) poison damagee, and the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC = 11 + PB), or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Lashing Whip (Vine only)
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + PB}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC = 11 + PB).

action.name: Soporific Scent (Flower only)
entries: The plant can cast the {@spell charm person|PHB} and {@spell sleep|PHB} spells at will. The maximum level at which it can cast the spells equals half of your proficiency bonus, rounded up.

action.name: Walloping Limb (Tree only
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + PB}) bludgeoning damage.
